snippet.title: Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island - Official Gameplay Overview Video
snippet.description:
Join developer Polygon Treehouse for a deep dive into the gameplay of Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island in this new video for the upcoming adventure game. Learn how to make friends and how the game's friendship mechanic works, like having conversations and embarking on quests. We also get to see treasure hunting and how to unlock gods' memories in the video. Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island will be available on PC, Xbox Series X/S, and Xbox One in summer 2024.

Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island invites you to take on the role of backpacker Alex, who has found herself stranded on the gorgeous shores of Ambrosia Island. As she begins to explore her surroundings, she discovers that she is not alone – the island is populated by the gods of Greek myth and legend! However, something is amiss – the gods are unable to remember who they are. In order to find her way home, she must befriend the inhabitants and help them to restore their memories.
